title: Fix insurance company logo display to show complete logos without cropping

requirements.summary: Modify the CompaniesSection component to display all five insurance company logos without any cropping by adjusting container dimensions, object-fit properties, padding, and aspect ratio constraints
acceptanceCriteria: All five carrier logos display completely without any portions being cut off
Logo aspect ratios are maintained properly
No visual cropping occurs on any logo element
The '+25 other carriers' card remains properly styled and positioned

file_operations.description: Adjust the logo container styling to prevent cropping: increase container height constraints, change object-fit from 'cover' to 'contain', add appropriate padding around logo images, adjust aspect ratio constraints to accommodate full logo dimensions, and ensure the grid layout provides sufficient space for each logo to display completely. Verify that all five logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, and Forrester) render in their entirety and that the '+25 other carriers' card styling remains consistent with the layout.
